Harlingen.Harlingen High School: 'Harlingen High School", also abbreviated as HHS, is a public high school located in Harlingen, Texas (USA). It is part of the Harlingen Consolidated Independent School District and was the first of three HCISD high schools established. HHS was the sole high school from its establishment in 1913 to 1993 when the school split and Harlingen High School South was formed.
